Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx.richtextarea

Class RichTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • com.dlsc.gemsfx.richtextarea.RichTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
    public class RichTextArea
extends javafx.scene.control.Control
    A text area capable to displaying rich text based on a custom rich text model (see RTDocument). The styling of the text elements can be done via CSS.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class javafx.scene.layout.Region

        the hyperlink handler
